txt.en: 'Midsummer is a joyous festival honouring the bonds of friendship, family, and marriage. All across Middle-earth, the Free Peoples celebrate through dance, song, artisanry, and rites of old!\n\n'If you wish to join in the festivities here in Thorin's Hall, you should speak to Skóri in the Thorin's Hall Inn or Slágin in the Forging Hall.'
Where can I join in Midsummer festivities?
